backend/main.mo: Defines the main actor with authorization, blob storage, and all domain types plus in‑memory maps for members, check-ins, tasks, notes, messages, announcements, and user profiles.
backend/migration.mo: Provides a migration that adds lastWeightUpdate to existing member profiles by transforming an old members map into a new format.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries linking frontend files, components, and tests to two weight‑update‑related product features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of key frontend files, including routing, profile setup, role helpers, member pages, and dashboard behavior.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base file defining theme variables for light and dark modes and applying global background/foreground styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that loads the React app via main.tsx into a root div.
frontend/src/announcements/AnnouncementC: Form page for creating announcements with title, content, segment selection, publish toggle, and submission via createAnnouncement mutation.
frontend/src/announcements/Announcements: Displays a list of published announcements in cards, falling back to an empty state if none exist.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the full TanStack Router tree, authentication gating, profile setup flow, and role-based routing to coach or member dashboards.
frontend/src/auth/loginIntent.ts: Utilities to store, read, and clear login intent (coach or member) in sessionStorage.
frontend/src/auth/LoginPage.tsx: Login UI allowing users to choose coach or member role and trigger Internet Identity login with selected intent.
frontend/src/auth/ProfileSetupModal.tsx: Modal for initial profile setup where users enter name, choose role, optionally link member via phone, and submit to backend.
frontend/src/automations/CoachDigestPage: Dashboard summarizing overdue and due-today follow‑up tasks with quick access to member details.
frontend/src/automations/ReminderQueuePa: Page listing members needing daily check-in reminders and providing WhatsApp action options.
frontend/src/checkins/DailyCheckinPage.t: Form for members to submit daily health metrics and notes, then navigate to member dashboard.
Form for members to submit weekly measurements, reflections, and progress updates.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Layout component that manages navigation, authentication state, and role-based menus for coach and member views.
frontend/src/dashboards/CoachDashboardPa: Coach dashboard showing member counts, activity stats, task summaries, and quick navigation actions.
frontend/src/dashboards/MemberDashboardP: Member dashboard displaying streaks, weight progress, recent check‑ins, and shortcuts to check‑in and profile pages.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor tied to the user's identity, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Fetches and exposes the logged-in user's profile and role information using the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication context using Internet Identity, including login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for CRUD operations on members, check-ins, tasks, notes, messages, and announcements via the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind layers and defines light/dark theme CSS variables plus base element styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/members/MemberFormDialog.ts: Dialog form for creating or editing a member profile with validation and mutation hooks.
frontend/src/members/MemberListPage.tsx: Displays searchable member list with cards and includes a dialog for adding new members.
frontend/src/members/MemberProfilePage.t: Shows detailed member profile, allows coaches to edit data, and supports weight updates and timeline view.
frontend/src/messaging/templates.ts: Defines WhatsApp message templates and a helper to substitute member names.
frontend/src/messaging/WhatsAppActions.t: Lets coaches send templated WhatsApp messages and logs each message attempt.
frontend/src/reports/csv.ts: Utility for converting records to CSV and triggering file downloads.
frontend/src/reports/ReportsExportPage.t: Exports members, check-ins, and message logs to CSV using query data.
frontend/src/settings/SettingsPage.tsx: Displays settings for reminder times and follow-up frequency with inputs and a save button.
frontend/src/tasks/TaskListPage.tsx: Fetches and categorizes follow-up tasks, showing task counts, tabs, and cards with completion actions.
frontend/src/tasks/TaskStatusPill.tsx: Renders a status badge based on task status using predefined variants.
frontend/src/timeline/MemberTimeline.tsx: Aggregates various member-related events into a sortable timeline with filtering controls.
frontend/src/utils/clipboard.ts: Provides a clipboard copy utility with modern API support and a fallback method.
frontend/src/utils/roles.ts: Utilities for checking user roles and generating human-readable role labels.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, features, and new feature requests for weight update functionality.
